flawed_nl_solution:
After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=45>>45 biscuits.
After his mother gave him 15 biscuits, Randy has 45 + 15 = <<45+15=60>>60 biscuits.
After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 60 - 20 = <<60-20=20>>20 biscuits.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
